column1: Little Goat Diner////The issue begins with the main course--all three of us ordered the fried chicken after asking for suggestions from the waitress. When our food arrives
column2: my friend noticed that her chicken leg could have been cooked longer but the wing was cooked perfectly. I also noticed that my chicken could have been cooked a little more. It's not until my friend sliced into her chicken breast
column3: which actually required her to cut into the meat with her knife. When she cut into the meat
column5: which anyone who has ever cooked a chicken will know is not the proper color for a fully cooked breast (unless it has been barbecued but this
